Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Anmas rucci', 'Included Components': 'Glitter, Tweezer', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 6.06 x 2.6 inches; 8.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '786118089648'}
Review Text: The anmas rucci Acrylic Nail Art Tools Kit gives you a little bit of everything for making your nails, or even crafting creations several different options for creative expression. My favorite part of the set is the half-pearls and pixie beads, but all of the pieces are really pretty. The tape works well with my own adhesive I already had on hand. This is a really fun set and I'd recommend them to anyone that likes to get creative with their nail art!
Review Title: Very Nice Set!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Butterfly Nail Art Decals Water Transfer Stickers, 22 Sheets Butterfly Nail Sticker DIY Nail Decals, 2 Set Butterfly Nail Glitter Holographic Stickers Reflected Butterfly Designs for Nails Supply
B bangcool
{'Surface Recommendation nail': '', '': 'Unit Count 1.00 Count', 'Shape Irregular': '', 'Brand': 'B bangcool', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches', 'Theme': 'Butterfly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Reusability': 'Single Use', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Pattern': 'Insects', 'Product Dimensions': '6.3 x 3.54 x 1.57 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
The Butterfly Nail Art Decals Water Transfer Stickers bundle is a great deal. You get 22 full sheets of stickers. Each sheet has over 50 stickers as far as I've counted them. They are either multi-colored and halographic or metallic outlined patterns. Every sheet is a little different, so there are no repeats. They apply easily, but I highly recommend doing a base coat first and a coat on top as well. There are also 2 generously filled jars of holographic butterflies that measure 4mm by 4mm at the widest points. This is a really pretty collection of butterflies and I couldn't recommend them more for both the value and variety!
Fantastic Value!

My favorite part of the set is the half-pearls and pixie beads, but all of the pieces are really pretty. The tape works well with my own adhesive I already had on hand. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Enthusiastic about nail art, favoring decorative stickers, decals, and crafting supplies for personalized designs.
- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Drawn to vibrant, colorful designs, particularly those featuring holographic, metallic elements, and nature themes like butterflies.
- **Value Sensitivity:** Prioritizes cost-effective products that offer a variety of options in a single purchase, seeking high value in the items they buy.
- **Application Preferences:** Favors easy-to-apply products and appreciates recommendations for optimal use, such as base and top coats.
- **Usage Patterns:** Enjoys DIY projects focused on personal grooming and fashion aesthetics, demonstrating a creative flair in personal expression.
- **Feedback Behavior:** Leaves detailed, positive reviews that highlight the value and quality of products, emphasizing the versatility and fun aspects of the items used in nail art.

Recent interactions indicate a continued appreciation for comprehensive nail art kits, showcasing a preference for sets that include various components, enhancing creative possibilities. The user values products that facilitate creativity and self-expression, underpinning a strong interest in both the aesthetic and practical elements of nail art tools.
